# userInfo

**Instance Property**

The user info dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute Object userInfo;
```

## Discussion

If no user info dictionary has been set, this property is `null`. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/tverror/user_info_dictionary_keys] for a list of keys.

## Getting Error Properties

- **code**: The error code.
- **description**: A string containing the description of the error.
- **domain**: A string containing the error domain.

items.description: A string containing the description of the error.
items.name: description

items.description: A string containing the error domain.
